DOC.brief_title: Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Treatment Completion Withdrawal
DOC.detailed_description: Qualitative pilot study patient ' view experience antiviral treatment hepatitis C. Two group patient sample : nine complete 24 48 week course treatment nine withdrew treatment prior plan end . Interview data analyze use narrative ground theory method identify attribute treatment experience may discriminate completion withdrawal .
DOC.criteria: Ever initiate anitiviral treatment hepatitis C .
